reviews.review_msg: although the lectures are dry, most of the content is very straightforward and since this is the first time she's teaching the course, everything is very clear. the midterm was mostly from her lecture content so read the slides. there is a presentation in the tutorial

Rachelle is an amazing prof! She genuinely cares for students, and wants us to succeed. She makes the tutorials engaging and all her grading is super transparent. She encourages class participation but won't pick on you to speak which I appreciate. I took this course as an elective (I'm in BPK) and now I'm sad I wont have another class with her.

Rachelle is a great prof, very straightforward. Go to class, get the grade, no bs. Korrie Grant is an amazing TA, preps you for exams and will give you all the support you need. Exams all lecture material, nothing stressful. 1 court observation and group project honeslty as long as you follow the instructions you're good. 100% recommend.

Rachelle was an amazing prof and her lectures were very engaging. She showed a lot of videos and brought in a few guest speakers. The TA's are also very nice and helpful. Her exams are very straight forward, mostly from the lecture slides and from what the guest speakers said. She has a group project but it is very easy.

AN AMAZING PROF!!!!! I had Korrie Grant as my TA and she was also AMAZING!! this class had interesting concepts. there was a court observation assignment which was kind of fun. there was a partner project which involved some arts and crafts. the midterm was super str8 forward- straight from lecture slides.  ALSO had guest speakers. SO GOOD!!
